title: How can I remove the fade out on the shadows?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • Unity does not offer a public API to remove the fade out on the shadows.

sections.title: Cause
content: The public API does not offer any method for removing the fade out on the shadows, however with C# and our built-in shaders it is possible to overwrite the shadows fade out.

Another option could be to increase the camera distance, and the fade out will appear in a far away distance from the view.
